description: This Dart source file defines a SearchService class that performs simple in-memory search over a list of Book objects based on a query string. It leverages sample data and provides a method to search for books by title or author, case-insensitive.

classes.name: SearchService
classes.description: A service class that provides search functionality over a list of books, with the ability to override its dataset via constructor parameter.

methods.name: search
methods.description: Filters books to include those where the title or author contains the query string, ignoring case. Returns all books if the query is empty.
